page.title: 19Places to eat & drink-Stone.
page.content: {There are 6 places to choose from}in the area,1 hotel,1 restaurant,4 public houses.The hotel and restaurant are {free houses,}all the pubs are{tied. Only one,a publican had been there a long time-30 years.The others varied between 6 months and 6 years, and all of these had children under 9 years old. The hotel{employed}50 full-time and 28 part-time people,the restaurant 28 part-time people.The public houses with dining rooms also also employed many people.{Prices}varied in the dining room from Â£4.25 to Â£25.00. and bar snacks from 20p to Â£5.00. All the{managers and tenants}enjoyed meeting people,but disliked being tied late nights and complaints.None wanted to continue the same work for the rest of their lives.Only one wanted their children to do the same job.
